content.text: Match ends, FC Schalke 04 1, Newcastle United 3.
Second Half ends, FC Schalke 04 1, Newcastle United 3.
Goal!  FC Schalke 04 1, Newcastle United 3. Donis Avdijaj (FC Schalke 04) header from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Axel Borgmann with a cross.
Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Adam Campbell.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Ralf Fährmann.
Attempt saved. Haris Vuckic (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Remie Streete.
Donis Avdijaj (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Adam Campbell (Newcastle United).
Maurice Multhaup (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mehdi Abeid (Newcastle United).
Attempt saved. Donis Avdijaj (FC Schalke 04) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Marco Höger with a headed pass.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Adam Campbell replaces Mike Williamson.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Haris Vuckic replaces Vurnon Anita.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Ayoze Pérez replaces Paul Dummett.
Foul by Remie Streete (Newcastle United).
Donis Avdijaj (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Maurice Multhaup (FC Schalke 04) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Donis Avdijaj.

Foul by Paul Dummett (Newcastle United).
Goal!  FC Schalke 04 0, Newcastle United 3. Rémy Cabella (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Facundo Ferreyra.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Axel Borgmann replaces Dennis Aogo.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Pascal Itter replaces Max Meyer.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Marvin Friedrich.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Adam Armstrong replaces Rolando Aarons.
Max Meyer (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rémy Cabella (Newcastle United).
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Marvin Friedrich.
Attempt saved. Christian Fuchs (FC Schalke 04) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marcel Sobottka.
Foul by Lubomir Satka (Newcastle United).
Dennis Aogo (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Donis Avdijaj (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mike Williamson (Newcastle United).
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Donis Avdijaj replaces Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting.
Attempt missed. Lubomir Satka (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Rémy Cabella.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Felipe Santana.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Marvin Friedrich.
Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Gabriel Obertan.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Rémy Cabella replaces Yoan Gouffran.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Facundo Ferreyra replaces Emmanuel Rivière.

Goal!  FC Schalke 04 0, Newcastle United 2. Rolando Aarons (Newcastle United) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left to the top right corner. Assisted by Mapou Yanga-Mbiwa.
Attempt missed. Vurnon Anita (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt blocked. Emmanuel Rivière (Newcastle United) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Marco Höger (FC Schalke 04) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Christian Fuchs with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Lubomir Satka.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Marvin Friedrich replaces Kaan Ayhan.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Mapou Yanga-Mbiwa replaces Fabricio Coloccini.

Substitution, Newcastle United. Lubomir Satka replaces Jack Colback.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Mehdi Abeid replaces Moussa Sissoko.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Robert Elliot replaces Tim Krul.
Second Half begins FC Schalke 04 0, Newcastle United 1.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Christian Fuchs replaces Kevin-Prince Boateng.
First Half ends, FC Schalke 04 0, Newcastle United 1.
